original: LARSON, Hilmer, Försäljningschef, Vänersborg, f Frändefors, Älvsb l, 16/11 92 av åkare L J Nilsson o Anna-Lisa Ericsson, gm Signe Blomqvist. Aft.sk, Hermods, priv.stud. Anst AB A F Carlssons skomag sed. 05, kont 07—20, förs.ch sed. 21. Stdflm, ordf fam.bidr.-nmdn, led dräts.kamm, hamnstyr, fat.v.styr folksk.styr, flicksk.styr mfl nmdr o komm:er Ordf miss.förs, v. ordf Vbg frikyrkl samarb. komm, sekr Västkust :s kristl sångarfrb sed 24, ordf Fp:s Vbgsavd, sekr Älvsb l N valkr. frb av Fp, styr.led Västkust :s ungd.sk mm. Av trycket: Div jub.skr.
translated: LARSON, Hilmer, Sales Manager, Vänersborg, born in Frändefors, Älvsborg county, on November 16, 1892. Son of the coachman L J Nilsson and Anna-Lisa Ericsson. Married to Signe Blomqvist. Attended evening school (Afton- och Hermods). Private studies. Employed at AB A F Carlsson's shoe factory since 1905. Worked as a clerk from 1907 to 1920, and as a sales manager since 1921. Chairman of the family benefits committee. Member of various boards and committees including the municipal council, harbor council, primary school board, and girls' school board. Chairman of the mission society. Vice chairman of the Vänersborg Free Church cooperation committee. Secretary of the West Coast Christian Singers' Association since 1924. Chairman of the Vänersborg division of the Liberal Party. Secretary of the Älvsborg county branch of the Liberal Party election committee. Board member of the West Coast Youth Association, among others. Publications: Various jubilee writings.
